name: Translation Questionnaire Request
title: TQ
definition: Indicates that a translation questionnaire is being submitted.
validEntryNotes: When the first position of TQ is “A” the ASR which has the TQ Form attached will be identified in the RPON field.
When the first position of TQ is “L” “M” “W” “X” or “C” entries in the CC or WST or the CC and the WST fields are required.
When the first position of TQ is “A” “B” “D” “S” “T” “U” or “1-9” entries in the CC or WST or the CC and the WST fields are prohibited.
When the first position of TQ is “A” “B” “D” “S” “T” “U” or “1-9” entries in the CC or WST or the CC and the WST fields are prohibited.
The second position of “X” indicates a Trunking Form is provided for system requirements rather than provisioning purposes.
When the ACT field is “N” a second position of “N” or “X” is prohibited.
When the first position of the TQ field is “E” the second position of the TQ field must be an “X”.
When the first position of the TQ field is “E” the first position of the REQTYP field must be an “L” and the ACT field must be a “C”.
When the first position of the TQ field is “C” the first position of the REQTYP field must be an “M” and the ACT field must be a “C”.
usageNotes: Required when the first position of the REQTYP   field is “M” the ACT field is “N” and the ACTI field   is “B” or “C”.
Optional when the first position of the REQTYP   field is “L” or “M” and the ACT field is “C”.
Required when the first position of the REQTYP   field is “M” the ACT field is “D” and the ACTI field   is “E”.
